snippet.title: Best of Sandhya Mukherjee | Bengali Songs Audio Jukebox | Vol.1 | Sandhya Mukherjee Songs

localized.description:
Songs ::
♪ Aay Bristi Jhenpe - 00:00
♪ Akasher Astarage - 03:08
♪ Ogo Mor Geetimoy - 06:26

♪ Ujjwal Ek Jhank Payra - 12:51
♪ Anek Doorer Oi Je Akash - 15:51
♪ Hoyto Kichhui Nahi Pabo - 18:48
♪ Phuler Kane Bhramar Aane - 21:53
♪ Gaane Mor Kon Indradhanu - 24:16
♪ Gabhir Raate Jagi Khunji Tomare - 27:24

Sandhya Mukhopadhyay is an Indian singer and musician, specialising in Bengali music. She was born in Kolkata, India. She is also known as Sandhya Mukherjee. She was very close friends with the late Alpana Banerjee.

Song Details ::
Song : Aay Bristi Jhenpe
Artist : Sandhya Mukherjee
